title: Sacred Journey - Kailash Mansarovar
description: Embark on the most sacred pilgrimage on Earth. Experience the divine presence of Lord Shiva at Mount Kailash and cleanse your spirit in the holy waters of Lake Mansarovar.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Arrive in Kathmandu, meet our team, and prepare for the sacred journey ahead.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu to Nepalgunj
itinerary.description: Fly to Nepalgunj and prepare for border crossing to Tibet.

itinerary.title: Nepalgunj to Simikot to Hilsa
itinerary.description: Helicopter flight to Simikot, then drive to Hilsa border.

itinerary.title: Hilsa to Taklakot
itinerary.description: Cross into Tibet and drive to Taklakot for acclimatization.

itinerary.title: Taklakot to Mansarovar
itinerary.description: Drive to the sacred Lake Mansarovar for holy bath and prayers.

itinerary.title: Mansarovar to Darchen
itinerary.description: Morning prayers at Mansarovar, then drive to Darchen, base for Kailash Parikrama.

itinerary.title: Kailash Parikrama Day 1
itinerary.description: Begin the sacred circumambulation of Mount Kailash.

itinerary.title: Kailash Parikrama Day 2
itinerary.description: Cross Dolma La Pass (5,630m) and complete the sacred circuit.

itinerary.title: Darchen to Taklakot
itinerary.description: Return journey to Taklakot for rest and reflection.

itinerary.title: Hilsa to Simikot to Nepalgunj
itinerary.description: Cross back to Nepal and fly to Nepalgunj.

itinerary.title: Return to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Fly back to Kathmandu with blessed memories.
